LanguageData.Squirrel.label: squirrel
LanguageData.Squirrel.description: One of the many hardy, versatile rodent species that follows humankind everywhere it spreads.
LanguageData.Squirrel_Leather.label: squirrelskin
LanguageData.Squirrel_Leather.description: Leather made from the skin of a squirrel.
LanguageData.Squirrel_Meat.label: squirrel meat
LanguageData.Squirrel_Corpse.label: squirrel corpse
LanguageData.Deer.label: deer
LanguageData.Deer.description: A medium-sized herding herbivore. Generally peaceful unless disturbed.
LanguageData.Deer_Leather.label: deerhide
LanguageData.Deer_Leather.description: Leather made from the skin of a deer.
LanguageData.Deer_Meat.label: venison
LanguageData.Deer_Corpse.label: deer corpse
LanguageData.Elk.label: elk
LanguageData.Elk.description: A large member of the deer family, well-adapted to life in cold climates.
LanguageData.Elk_Leather.label: elkhide
LanguageData.Elk_Leather.description: Leather made from the skin of a elk.
LanguageData.Elk_Meat.label: venison
LanguageData.Elk_Corpse.label: elk corpse
LanguageData.Alphabeaver.label: alphabeaver
LanguageData.Alphabeaver.description: A large beaver derivative genetically engineered to harvest wood with machine-like efficiency. In the absence of specialized feed, these animals will enter a manic state that compels them to eat trees whole.
LanguageData.Alphabeaver_Leather.label: beaverskin
LanguageData.Alphabeaver_Leather.description: Leather made from the skin of a alphabeaver.
LanguageData.Alphabeaver_Meat.label: alphabeaver meat
LanguageData.Alphabeaver_Corpse.label: alphabeaver corpse
LanguageData.WildBoar.label: wild boar
LanguageData.WildBoar.description: Although considered impure by some cultures, this hairy ancestor of the domesticated pig is prized for the gamey flavor of its meat.
LanguageData.WildBoar_Leather.label: boarskin
LanguageData.WildBoar_Leather.description: Leather made from the skin of a wild boar.
LanguageData.WildBoar_Meat.label: boarmeat
LanguageData.WildBoar_Meat.description: Raw flesh of a wild boar.
LanguageData.WildBoar_Corpse.label: wild boar corpse
LanguageData.WildBoar_Corpse.description: Dead body of a wild boar.
LanguageData.Boomrat.label: boomrat
LanguageData.Boomrat.description: Either by deliberate genetic weaponization, or as an unusual defense mechanism, these rodent-like creatures create a powerful fire-starting explosion when killed.
LanguageData.Boomrat_Leather.label: boomrat leather
LanguageData.Boomrat_Leather.description: Leather made from the skin of a boomrat.
LanguageData.Boomrat_Meat.label: boomrat meat
LanguageData.Boomrat_Corpse.label: boomrat corpse
LanguageData.Tortoise.label: tortoise
LanguageData.Tortoise.description: This heavily armored land-dwelling reptile is known for its slow moving speed and surprisingly vicious bite.
LanguageData.Tortoise_Leather.label: tortoise leather
LanguageData.Tortoise_Leather.description: Leather made from the skin of a tortoise.
LanguageData.Tortoise_Meat.label: tortoise meat
LanguageData.Tortoise_Corpse.label: tortoise corpse
LanguageData.Thrumbo.label: thrumbo
LanguageData.Thrumbo.description: A gigantic creature of unknown origin. The thrumbo is gentle by nature, but extremely dangerous when enraged. Its long fur is exceptionally beautiful and valuable, and its razor-sharp horn is very valuable in most markets. Legends say that an old thrumbo is the wisest creature in the universe - it simply chooses not to speak.
LanguageData.Thrumbo_Leather.label: thrumbofur
LanguageData.Thrumbo_Leather.description: Leather made from the skin of a thrumbo.
LanguageData.Thrumbo_Meat.label: thrumbo meat
LanguageData.Thrumbo_Corpse.label: thrumbo corpse
